definition: repeatedly/over and over/to upend/unstable/to come and go/(of an illness) to return
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to cover/to overflow/to overturn/to capsize
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
unstable/erratic/changeable/fickle

sentences.english: I am tired of hunting the same old coon.
sentences.chinese: 反覆幹同樣的事，我真幹膩了。

sentences.english: The reason flu keeps infecting us again and again is that the virus is constantly changing.
sentences.chinese: 流感能夠反覆感染我們的原因在於病毒的不斷變化。

sentences.english: Repeated hitting raised a large bruise.
sentences.chinese: 反覆擊打造成一大塊青腫。

sentences.english: I counted every day the date when jack would return.
sentences.chinese: 我每天反反覆覆的數着安傑的歸期。

sentences.english: I repeated them until I could recite seventy stories without dropping a word.
sentences.chinese: 我反覆背誦，直到我能一字不漏地背出七十篇故事來。

sentences.english: Because embolus can fall off repeatedly, have a relapse easily so.
sentences.chinese: 由於栓子可以反覆脫落，所以容易復發。

sentences.english: We don’t want to ding them with fines.
sentences.chinese: 我們並不想反覆地跟他們講罰款。

sentences.english: Significant differences between the bronchial asthma and the repeated respiratory infections were found.
sentences.chinese: 發現支氣管哮喘和反覆呼吸道感染之間差別顯著。

sentences.english: Sound background have 5 reiterative wilds sounds.
sentences.chinese: 健全的背景有5反覆荒野的聲音。

sentences.english: He repeats the same thing over and over again.
sentences.chinese: 反覆幹同樣的事，我真幹膩了。

sentences.english: You sit crouched in your palanquin and repeat the names of the gods in prayer.
sentences.chinese: 你蹲坐在你的轎子裏，嘴裏反覆地禱唸着神的名字。

sentences.english: He ruminated over various possibilities concerning his future.
sentences.chinese: 他反覆思考自己前途的各種可能性。

sentences.english: Markets see-sawed all day, with S&P officials refusing to comment on their plans.
sentences.chinese: 市場全天反覆漲跌，標普高管拒絕就其計劃置評。

sentences.english: Bacteria and virus infection and easy to.
sentences.chinese: 細菌和病毒容易反覆感染。

sentences.english: Don't chant things like "loser" or taunt them when they lose.
sentences.chinese: 不要反覆喊着“失敗者”或者奚落他們。

sentences.english: They have made many trips traveling both north and south on the eastern intercoastal waterway.
sentences.chinese: 他們在東海岸內陸航道上有過反覆多次的南北航行。

definition: variant of 重複|重复[chong2 fu4]
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
to refuse to concede/not to give in
eager to/in a hurry to
around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
as for/as to/to go so far as to
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because

variant of 複述|复述[fu4 shu4]
variant of 並|并[bing4]/variant of 併|并[bing4]

to suppress/to restrain
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
if/supposing/in case
see 倘佯[chang2 yang2]
to alter (text)/to change by painting over/to correct (with correction fluid)
shameful secret
